name: Eyes of Fear
description: Eyes of Fear - an elementary 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you pass quite difficult levels, playing for an alien. The essence of this game is very simple, you need to collect all the pumpkins on the level and not die. But be careful, you can meet a variety of obstacles, such as other monsters, traps, and so on. Once you collect all the items on the level, you will see the door to the home of the alien, passing through which you will find yourself on another level. Don't turn off the right way. Good luck!
